title: DIARY-India corporate earnings week ahead
text:
DIARY-India corporate earnings week ahead

Stock Markets 37 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 12:00)

© Reuters. DIARY-India corporate earnings week ahead Oct 18 (Reuters) - Diary of India (.BSESN) corporate earnings for the week ahead. EPS figures can be retrieved from Eikon. Steps in Eikon to retrieve the EPS estimate:- Eikon Indicator-> Equities Guide-> Top Indices-> SENSEX-> Events-> Select Event types-> Select the company-> Estimates
